emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Health-O-Rama Steering Committee, from left, seated: Sister Teresa Clare, Mrs. Alfred Cardell, Mrs. Howard Obman, Elizabeth B. Harris, Doris Johnston, and Sister Editha; standing: Linda Richards, "Miss Torch"; Eileen Garvan, "Miss Health-O-Rama"; Judy Pohl, "Miss USO"; and Jo Ann Vogliano, "Miss Red Feather", gathered in interior with wood paneled walls
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 8, 1965, pg. 5 reads: "Health-O-Rama Volunteers - Mrs. Elizabeth B. Harris, co-chairman of the Women's Community Participation Committee, reports the progress of her volunteers for the forthcoming program scheduled to be held May 20-23 in East Liberty. Pictured left to right: C. William Seasholtz, Ed Beuter, Linda Richards, "Miss Torch"; Msgr. Ralph L. Hayes, Eileen Garvan, "Miss Health-O-Rama"; Judy Pohl, "Miss USO"; Prentice A. Burlingham. Jo Ann Vogliano, "Miss Red Feather"; Joseph Mancuso and Dr. Earl A. Dimmick.  Seated: Sister Teresa Clare, Mrs. Alfred Cardell, Mrs. Howard Obman, Mrs. Elizabeth B. Harris, Mrs. Doris Johnston and Sister Editha."
